value: Let's dive in with a code sample

What is the output of the following code?

if 12>5:
 if 6>4
  print(3)
 else:
  print(4)
else:
 print(5)

correct.value: 12>5 would be true hence IF block would be executed. Now in IF block we are checking the condition 6>4 which is true. Hence print(3) statement would be executed.

incorrect.value: 12>5 would be true hence IF block would be executed. Now in IF block we are checking the condition 6>4 which is true. Hence print(3) statement would be executed.
